source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_00<tab>Elfleda needs help preparing for the social event of the season.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_00<tab>十二神大聖堂のエルフレダには、欲しいものがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_01<tab>All aglow over her attendance at the forthcoming nuptials, Elfleda enlists your help in obtaining wind sprite cores. Slay some wind sprites and collect four cores.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_01<tab>友人の結婚式のため「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876F01 /var>」が欲しいというエルフレダ。「<var 28 ((BNpcName)) 7401 /var>」を倒して「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876F01 /var>」を4個入手しよう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_02<tab>You have obtained four wind sprite cores. If you would know why Elfleda needs such a thing for a Ceremony of Eternal Bonding, return to the Sanctum and place the cores in her hands.
target: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_02<tab>「<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876F01 /var>」を入手した。十二神大聖堂に戻り「エルフレダ」に渡そう。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_03<tab>Elfleda happily confides her plans to create a storm of rose petals for her friend. Imagining shattered windows and an airborne brigade of samite-clad ladies, you suggest she use just the one core...
target: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_SEQ_03<tab>エルフレダに<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876F01 /var>を渡した。彼女はそれを使って、巨大なフラワーシャワーをすることを計画しているらしい。

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_TODO_00<tab>Slay wind sprites for their cores.
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_TODO_01<tab>Give the wind sprite cores to Elfleda.

TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_000<tab>The Sanctum feels so very...<var 1A 02 /var>sanctified<var 1A 01 /var>, don't you find? A very good friend of mine─practically sisters, we are─is to be joined to her beloved here, and I've been invited. It is such an honor─you ought to see her trousseau!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_000あ～ん、十二神大聖堂って本当に素敵！
私の友達がね、今度ここで結婚するの～！
だからね、私ね、準備のために下見に来たんだっ♪

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_001<tab>But I digress! So easy to do that about dresses, don't you find? Especially about Meracydian samite and this <var 1A 02 /var>wonderfully<var 1A 01 /var> fine lace made by tiny Lalafellin children. There I go again! I meant to ask you about wind sprites, do pardon me.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_001それでねそれでね、冒険者さんにお願いっ！
「」を倒して、
「」を4つ、持ってきてくれないかな～？

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_002<tab>Well, not really wind sprites so much as their cores. I need four of them. Why? Oh, I can't tell you! Not until you get them. Secrets are so much fun, don't you find?
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_002……何に使うのかって？
えへへ～それはまだ、ヒ・ミ・ツ！
よろしくね～っ！
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_DUMMY_000_010<tab>ウィンドスプライトを倒し、<var 28 ((EventItem)) F61E876F01 /var>を入手×4

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_020<tab>You have the cores? Wonderful! Oh, this <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> be the social event of the season. So exciting! My friend and I are very close─practically sisters, you know!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_020「」を4つよ。
オ・ネ・ガ・イ♪

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_021<tab>Thank you ever so much! Shall I tell you my little secret? Well, since you've been so very helpful... I'm going to use these when it's time to throw the rose petals. It will be quite the flower storm, to be sure!
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_021あ～ん、ありがと～！
実はね、これを使って、風を起こして……
フラワーシャワーを盛大に舞い散らせようと思ってるの！

source: TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_022<tab>Four is too many? Are you sure? Oh. Well, I suppose I <var 1A 02 /var>should<var 1A 01 /var> try it beforehand once, perhaps on my own estate. It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> the social event of the season.
target:
TEXT_GAIUSC306_00973_ELFLEDA_000_022ウフフフ、いい考えだと思わない？
あ～あ、私も準備なんかしてないで、
早く幸せな結婚をしたいな～！
